news_header: Residents evacuated in Godstone after sinkholes appeared on high street, possibly due to a burst water main.
news_original_title: What is a sinkhole and how does it form?
news_text: Residents in Godstone were evacuated after two sinkholes opened along the high street. The first hole appeared late Monday, growing to 65ft by Tuesday. Sinkholes can form due to geological factors or human activities, such as a burst water main. Experts suggest historic mining may also contribute to the issue.
